title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, December 16, 2014
teaser: Aired on December 16, 2014: First up, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of CNET.com, talks about how social networks use games to make sure their users keep coming back for more. And Russell Brandom, a reporter for The Verge, on what the Sony hack revealed about Hollywood’s fraught relationship with Silicon Valley.
description: Aired on December 16, 2014: First up, Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of CNET.com, talks about how social networks use games to make sure their users keep coming back for more. And Russell Brandom, a reporter for The Verge, on what the Sony hack revealed about Hollywood’s fraught relationship with Silicon Valley.
